decoworld.model.world.map

Class TileSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.map.TileSet

  • public final class TileSet
extends java.lang.Object
    The comprehensive set of Tile that may be used in a Map. Infrastructure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DIRECTORY_ROOT
      Holds all tiles by Id.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes a new TileSet from the specified set of tiles.

      • DIRECTORY_ROOT

        public static final java.lang.String DIRECTORY_ROOT
        Holds all tiles by Id. Invariant: tiles[i].getId() == i && tiles.length > 0

    • Method Detail

      • createDummyTiles

        public static TileSet createDummyTiles()
        Used for creating a set of test tiles.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the Tileset. This is the same as the name of the file it was loaded from.
        Returns:
        the name of the Tileset.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int id)
        Returns the Tile with the given id.

        This will never be null.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tile to lookup.
        Returns:
        the tile with the given id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified id is invalid.

      • getTileCount

        public int getTileCount()
        Returns the number of Tile objects in this TileSet.
        Returns:
        the number of Tile objects objects in this TileSet.
